title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Elevate your walls with effortless elegance. This 2-piece set of 15.7-inch Gold Circle Mirrors combines modern artistry with everyday functionality, creating a striking focal point in any room.

- Artistic “circle-on-circles” design: Sculptural iron frames in a gold finish (between matte and bright) add depth, dimension, and a touch of luxury.
- Perfectly sized: Each piece measures 15.7 inches in diameter with a 10-inch mirror surface—substantial enough to stand out, sleek enough to blend in.
- Crystal-clear reflection: High-quality annealed glass delivers HD imaging with no warping or distortion.
- Light and easy: Each mirror weighs just 2 lb and hangs with a single screw for quick, secure installation.
- Style it your way: Hang as a pair or mix with paintings, wall sculptures, picture walls, or candle sconces. Works beautifully above a TV, in an entryway, bedroom, living room, bathroom, or office.
- Versatile glam: The refined gold frame complements modern, contemporary, and transitional decor.
- Thoughtful packaging: Decently packed for safe delivery.

Create instant visual impact and brighten your space with a sophisticated duo that reflects your style—and your best self.
